thread.title: Gautami’s latest photos defy her age
thread.title_full: Gautami’s latest photos defy her age

author: Deccan
title: Gautami’s latest photos defy her age
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 11, 2015, 23.46 pm Gautami Tadimalla Gautami Tadimalla has always gone against the tide. She has won over her fans with her choice of roles and inspired thousands of women by battling against breast cancer successfully. The 46-year-old actress has a body that defies her age. A recent photo of hers, shot by ace photographer G Venket Ram for a magazine, has gone viral on social media. One look at it and you will know why. The middle-aged actress could pass off as a woman in her early 20s! Gautami looks vivacious and bright in a cute little yellow dress in the photograph. In the series of photographs she is also seen sporting red sleeveless top paired with a black pant and in another one she looks hot in a blue spaghetti top and denims. The actress, who has always strongly believed in striking a balance between her mind and body, has been receiving tonnes of compliments for the photo. The Papanasam star was styled by Anjali Krishna for the shoot.
